items.name: Standard
meaning: Most common type, able to use many copies in a folder.

items.name: Mega
meaning: Uncommon, stronger chips that have an additional limitation:
Only **five** Mega Chips total are allowed in a folder.

items.name: Giga
meaning: Strongest class of chip. Only **one** Giga Chip is allowed in a folder.

items.name: Dark
meaning: These are the "fun" ones. Your friends will love them.
